blogPost.excerpt: qr.eletto.dev is a simple QR code generator for developers. It can be used in any project to quickly generate QR codes. Instead of installing libraries into your project to generate QR codes, you can just use the URL as an image.
blogPost.body: qr.eletto.dev is a simple QR code generator for developers. It can be used in any project to quickly generate QR codes. Instead of installing libraries into your project to generate QR codes, you can just use the URL as an image.
blogPost.title: QR Code Generator For Developers - A quick API to generate QR codes in your apps
blogPost.author: JohnAnthony Eletto

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一个简单的二维码生成器，适用于开发者。它可以用于任何项目中快速生成二维码。不需要在你的项目中安装库来生成二维码，你只需要使用URL作为图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的应用程序中生成QR码的快速API。

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一個簡單的二維碼生成器，適用於開發者。它可以用於任何項目中快速生成二維碼。不需要在你的項目中安裝庫來生成二維碼，你只需要使用URL作爲圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的應用程序中生成QR碼的快速API。

previous.excerpt: The Chief of Staff Network is a private community connecting Chiefs of Staff from the fastest growing startups and enterprises. Our community meets in a trusted environment to learn from one another, exchange ideas and reach their full potential as leaders.
previous.title: Chief of Staff Network - Community for Chiefs of Staff to accelerate their careers.

localize.description: 办公室主任网络是一个连接来自发展最快的初创企业和企业的办公室主任的私人社区。我们的社区在一个值得信赖的环境中聚会，相互学习，交流思想，充分发挥他们作为领导者的潜力。
localize.tagline: 为参谋长加快事业发展的社区。

localize.description: 辦公室主任網絡是一個連接來自發展最快的初創企業和企業的辦公室主任的私人社區。我們的社區在一個值得信賴的環境中聚會，相互學習，交流思想，充分發揮他們作爲領導者的潛力。
localize.tagline: 爲參謀長加快事業發展的社區。

next.excerpt: File sharing done simple. Accountless file sharing with no limits. Share files easily for free on Starfiles.
next.title: Starfiles - File hosting done simple

localize.description: 文件共享做得很简单。无帐号文件共享，无限制。在Starfiles上免费轻松分享文件。
文件共享做得很簡單。無帳號文件共享，無限制。在Starfiles上免費輕鬆分享文件。
